metadata.title: I-Mag Oval Reading Glasses with Slide Open Hard Case (+1.00, Brown)
features: Included: one full frame metal reading glasses, one matching color hard plastic tube case
Made with strong, durable, high quality, and lightweight full metal frame
Easy push button opens the case and pushes the glasses out of the case for you
4 small magnets on the case for easy attach to any metal surface
Super lightweight and fashion design provides style and comfort
description: The I-Mag Oval Metal Reading Glasses are high quality and easy to use. The color matching case has a special slide button. You can push the glasses out of the case with the slide button without any effort. Spring hinge design makes sure you have the perfect fit when wearing them. There are 4 small magnets on the side to attach the case to any metal surface. The tube case is slim to fit in small handbag or pocket. This full frame ready to wear reading glasses is stylish, comfortable, and perfect to wear in any occasion. Available in black, brown, silver, red, and blue
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "5.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 0.48 Ounces", "Item model number": "IMAGS", "Department": "unisex-adult", "Date First Available": "November 19, 2013", "Manufacturer": "Intervision"}
